parameters.Title: Your job is to create sustainable products and supply chains. Our job is to enable your success.
parameters.Subtitle: Eando X is made up of people passionate about how better data can help us make better decisions. Our EPP tool is built to collect and understand that data, simpler and better.

parameters.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

parameters.value: In a rapidly changing world where sustainability is a major driver of development and success, Carbonzero AB work to help companies successfully implement and reach the potential of their improvements and innovations. Carbonzero is driven by data, scientific facts, and the ability to create business value. We are strongly convinced that sustainability should be both simple and profitable. Every problem has a solution, and this is our philosophy when we take on a challenge on behalf of our clients. Sustainability is not a cost but an investment, if it is done in the right way, which is why the company was started. Carbon zero as a green tech company is both a knowledge base for business-driven sustainability and a software development company with a high focus on digital infrastructure. Carbonzero has long experience in sustainable services including performing LCAÂ´s and designing digital sustainability solutions. Carbonzero has developed and operates the unique sustainability platform Prodikt (www.prodikt.com), with a focus on stakeholders and actors in the construction and property sector. We are also providing an EPP (Environmental Product Performance) LCA software called EandoX, that enable a unique blockchain technology that brings supply chain and operations together in a LCA context. Through the dynamics between data-driven analyzes in the industry and the enabling of active decisions from the client's side, conditions are created for rapid product development, a high degree of innovation and sustainable changeover.
